definitions: Moves in a circular direction wholly or partly around an axis or point.
Changes in nature, state, form, or color.
Directs or aims something in a particular direction.
Reaches or passes a particular age or time.
Becomes or makes something become sour or rancid.
examples: The Earth turns on its axis.
The leaves turn brown in autumn.
She turns her head to listen.
The milk turns quickly in the heat.
